Get Connected

Our Journey

From a simple idea to a trusted local provider.

2020

Swiftel Fibre Founded

Began operations with a vision for future-proof, affordable connectivity.

2021

First Fibre Rollout

Launched our initial fibre network in Nairobi, serving our very first customers.

2023

Expanded Coverage

Significantly grew our fibre footprint across Kasarani and Njiru sub-counties.

2024

Launched Business Solutions

Introduced a suite of dedicated services for enterprises and SMEs.

2025

Hotspot Solutions Introduced

Launched flexible, pay-as-you-go internet access via dedicated local hotspots.

Our Promise to You

We're committed to more than just internet. We're committed to you.

Transparent Pricing

No hidden fees, no surprise charges. What you see is what you get, every month.

Reliable Speed

We deliver consistent, high-speed fibre you can count on for streaming, gaming, and working from home.

Local Support

Our friendly support team is based right here in Nairobi, ready to help you whenever you need it.
